item.title: James Gunn Receives Hero’s Welcome During ‘Superman’ Victory Lap at Comic-Con
item.description: During his first public appearance following his latest box office hit, the filmmaker earned a standing ovation from the Hall H crowd while choking up as he talked about his love of the comic book med
